alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 07 at 9:07PM EST until November 08 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 5 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Somerset, Northern Franklin, Northern Oxford, and Southern Oxford Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 5 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be strongest near mountains and intermountain passes, especially downwind of these features.
info.instruction: Wind gusts this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Oxford
